3. Supported operating systemsÂ¶

cdist was tested or is know to run on at least

  • Alpine Linux

  • Archlinux

  • CentOS

  • Debian

  • Devuan

  • Fedora

  • FreeBSD

  • Gentoo

  • Mac OS X

  • NetBSD

  • OpenBSD

  • Redhat

  • Ubuntu

  • XenServer
